Eschenbach Family Trust dtd 4/15/2014, Carl Eschenbach Jr and Ana Eschenbach TTEE
Represents shares withheld by the Issuer to satisfy the tax withholding obligation in connection with the vesting of restricted stock units (RSUs) and performance restricted stock units (PRSUs). Includes 226,338 RSUs and 212,552 PRSUs, each of which entitle the Reporting Person to receive one share of Class A Common Stock upon settlement. All grants are subject to the Reporting Person's continued service with the Issuer on the applicable vesting dates. The trust is in the name of the Reporting Person and his spouse, who are both trustees and beneficiaries of the trust.
